title: Video: Chairlift – Amanaemonesia
body:
**[Chairlift](http://www.facebook.com/chairlift)** lead singer Caroline Polachek and Tom Hines have made and directed the video for the new single, _Amanaemonesia_, which will be included on the their 3rd LP, due to be released on **[Columbia](http://www.columbiarecords.com/)** next year. To describe it as ‘odd’ would perhaps be an understatement, or perhaps more cynically, really fucking lazy.

What it is, above else, is glamorously Si-Fi, unnervingly paranoid and rather disturbingly comes across as an educational video. But yeah, I suppose it’s slightly ‘odd’ as well.

Stream it below.

[Amanaemonesia](http://vimeo.com/28041064) from [Chairlift](http://vimeo.com/chairlift) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).
